attributes.title: Manifesting Powers of Length Dimension: Nithyananda Disciples Initiated to Solve Any Equation
attributes.description: In this video from 4th January, 2017, Nithyananda disciples share their experiences related to manifesting the power to see the answer to any math or general knowledge question instantly and accurately! This includes advanced calculus, trigonometry and algebra, as well as distances between places (both on Earth and in space,) temperatures, astronomical transitions, medicine, foreign language translations and much more. Nithyananda describes that with initiation from Sadashiva into the Length Dimension, all hard fact answers can be instantly known, and already, the Balasants, or child saints, of the Nithyananda Gurukul are demonstrating this incredible superpower.
